div.p: The Media resource contains photos, videos, and audio recordings. It is used with media acquired or used as part of the healthcare process. Here are some typical usages:

ul.li: Photos of patients and staff for identification purposes
Photos and videos of diagnostic or care provision procedures for recording purposes
Storing scans and faxes of paper documents where not enough metadata exists to create a DocumentReference

div.p: Although the Media resource is allowed to contain images collected by a DICOM based system, DICOM images would preferentially be made available in a FHIR ecosystem by provision of an ImagingStudy resource with references to a WADO-RS server.
